description: Who says meat should have all the fun? Filling pumpkin, beetroot and haloumi get their time on the grill in this summer salad.
name: Grilled Pumpkin, Beetroot & Haloumi Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Brush pumpkin with 1 tbs of the oil. Sprinkle with cumin. Add to grill. Cook for 8 minutes each side or until browned and cooked. Transfer to a plate.
Add haloumi to grill. Cook for 1 minute each side or until golden. Transfer to a plate.
Whisk remaining oil with thyme in a small bowl.
Arrange rocket on a large platter. Top with beetroot, pumpkin and haloumi. Sprinkle with pistachio. Serve drizzled with oil mixture and balsamic glaze.
